sources.title: A Survey on Machine Learning in Education
sources.abstract: This paper reviews recent machine learning techniques applied in educational assessment and feedback systems.

sources.title: Automated Essay Scoring Using Natural Language Processing
sources.abstract: The study explores NLP-based methods for evaluating academic writing quality.

sources.title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Knowledge-Intensive NLP Tasks
sources.abstract: This paper introduces RAG, combining information retrieval with text generation to improve factual accuracy.
